Room.Name: North Oceancrest Guard Station Gate
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the gate of the North Oceancrest Guard Station.
Room.LongDescription: this gate is normally closed at night, but there is a door inside the Guard Station for citizens willing to assume the risk of leaving at night. No one is allowed to enter from outside during the night hours, however. During the day a constant stream of visitors and farmers use this gate.
